title: Bitter medicine = Medicina amara
creator_contributor_role: Leichardt Women's Community Health Centre, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drug abuse
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Women - Health and hygiene
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Women immigrants
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Women immigrants
description: Bitter medicine explores the personal experiences of migrant women in Australia and their use of tranquillisers. Through a dramatised reconstruction the video explores reasons that compel women to seek help and the common medical response. This video suggests alternatives to medication and presents migrant women's personal experiences and their determination to face a pill-free life.
